Mordor: MUD]] which opened in [[1998]], but had been in development since [[1988]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mordor.html Mordor] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 13 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu] (retrieved 13 April 2011)</ref> As the name suggests, the game is set in [[Mordor]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
